text: Sokode kare-ra wa, kare (no hikitori) ni nozomi ga nai koto o shiri, mitsu ni kyōgi shita. Kare-ra no naka no nenchō no mono ga itta. `Anata gata wa, chichi ga arrā (no gyomei) ni yotte chikai o tate, mata izen yūsufu no koto ni tsuite mo, do no yōna ayamari o okashita ka o kangaenai no ka. Sorede chichi ga watashi o yurusu ka, mata arrā ga watashi-tachi o o sabaki kudasaru made, watashi wa kesshite kono ji o hanarenaidearou. Kare wa mottomo sugureta saiketsu-sha de ara reru
